data.prayer: Spirit, teach those feeling unsafe in Northern, Fiji that they can hide under your wings
data.verse: He will cover you with his feathers, and under his wings you will find refuge; his faithfulness will be your shield and rampart.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Northern, Fiji
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, raise up apostolic workers to plant churches in every town in the state of Northern.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 3 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Lord, give grace to the local leaders who shepherd the 2,828,399 believers in the state of Northern.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd. The good shepherd lays down his life for the sheep.

data.prayer: Father, you desire the people in the state of Northern who are far from you to hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."

data.prayer: Spirit, I pray that the Hindi people will come and worship before you, Lord. May they glorify your name for you are great.
Father, move the 2,828,399 believers in the state of Northern to say "Not our will, but yours be done", like Jesus.
data.verse: He withdrew about a stone’s throw beyond them, knelt down and prayed, "Father, if you are willing, take this cup from me; yet not my will, but yours be done."

data.prayer: Jesus, help the church in the state of Northern to not rely on buildings or programs, but on your Spirit and the simple faithfulness of every believer.

data.section_summary:
the state of Northern, Fiji has a population of 10,747,300.

We estimate Northern has 2,828,399 people who might know Jesus, 4,080,299 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 3,838,602 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 3 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, if there is even one of the 2,828,399 believers in Northern, Fiji who does not have a Bible, please provide them one today.
